front.title: Use of IPFIX for Export of Per-Packet Information

abstract.t: This document describes the usage of the IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX) protocol for the case of exporting and processing per-packet information. The main idea is to export two types of records per flow: the first one contains the usual flow information plus a unique flow identifier while the other one consists of the actual per-packet information plus a flow identifier that refers to the flow the specific packet belongs to -- that means the flow identifier is used to associate the packet data to its corresponding flow.
